languages.text: {n}Четыре десятка поединщиков схлестнулись в суровой схватке. Каждый мог видеть, что силы их равны, а значит бой — праведный. К концу сражения в живых остался лишь неукротимый Гектархиус, настоятель Ордена Молота, и, следуя данной клятве, мальпийцы поклонились ему и признали учение святого Никомедаса.{/n}

{n}Four dozen fighters clashed in a bitter struggle. The forces were an equal match, and thus the duel righteous. By the end, only the indomitable Hectarchius, the prelate of the Order of the Hammer, was left standing, and, honouring their vow, the Malpians bowed down to him and accepted the teachings of Saint Nicomedes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Четыре десятка поединщиков схлестнулись в суровой схватке. Каждый мог видеть, что силы их равны, а значит бой — праведный. К концу сражения в живых остался лишь неукротимый Гектархиус, настоятель Ордена Молота, и, следуя данной клятве, мальпийцы поклонились ему и признали учение святого Никомедаса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Four dozens of fighters have fought in a bitter struggle. Everyone could see that their forces are equal, and therefore the fight is righteous. By the end of the battle, only the indomitable Hectarchius, the priest of the Order of the Hammer had survived, and, honouring their vow, the Malfesians had bowed down to him and accepted the teachings of Saint Nicomedas .{/n}

{n}Four dozens of fighters have fought in a bitter struggle. Everyone could see that their forces are equal, and therefore the fight is righteous. By the end of the battle, only the indomitable Hectarchius, the priest of the Order of the Hammer had survived, and, honouring their vow, the Malfesians had bowed down to him and accepted the teachings of Saint Nicomedas .{/n}

By the end, only the indomitable Hectarchius, the prelate of the Order of the Hammer, was left standing, and, honouring their vow, the Malpians bowed down to him and accepted the teachings of Saint Nicomedes.{/n}

By the end, only the indomitable Hectarchius, the prelate of the Order of the Hammer, was left standing, and, honouring their vow, the Malpians bowed down to him and accepted the teachings of Saint Nicomedes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}四十多名战士进行了一场激烈的战斗。这场决斗十分公正，双方势均力敌。到最后，只剩下重锤修会的牧师赫克塔奇乌斯还不屈不挠地站着。马尔皮人履行了他们的诺言，向他行礼鞠躬，接受了圣尼科梅迪斯的教诲。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Four dozen fighters clashed in a bitter struggle. The forces were an equal match, and thus the duel righteous. By the end, only the indomitable Hectarchius, the priest of the Order of the Hammer was left standing, and, honouring their vow, the Malpians bowed down to him and accepted the teachings of Saint Nicomedes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}四十多名战士进行了一场激烈的战斗。这场决斗十分公正，双方势均力敌。到最后，只剩下重锤修会的牧师赫克塔奇乌斯还不屈不挠地站着。马尔皮人履行了他们的诺言，向他行礼鞠躬，接受了圣尼科梅迪斯的教诲。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuatro docenas de combatientes se enfrentaron en una lucha encarnizada. Las fuerzas estaban igualadas, y así el duelo fue justo. Al final, solo quedó en pie el indomable Hectarchius, el sacerdote de la Orden del Martillo, y, haciendo honor a su voto, los malpianos se inclinaron ante él y aceptaron las enseñanzas de San Nicomedas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Four dozen fighters clashed in a bitter struggle. The forces were an equal match, and thus the duel righteous. By the end, only the indomitable Hectarchius, the priest of the Order of the Hammer was left standing, and, honouring their vow, the Malpians bowed down to him and accepted the teachings of Saint Nicomedas .{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuatro docenas de combatientes se enfrentaron en una lucha encarnizada. Las fuerzas estaban igualadas, y así el duelo fue justo. Al final, solo quedó en pie el indomable Hectarchius, el sacerdote de la Orden del Martillo, y, haciendo honor a su voto, los malpianos se inclinaron ante él y aceptaron las enseñanzas de San Nicomedas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}40数人のファイターが激闘を繰り広げた。戦力は拮抗していたため、正義の決闘となった。最終的に、鉄槌の修道会の司祭である不屈のヘクタールキウスが残り、マルピ人はその誓いに敬意を表して彼にひれ伏し、聖ニコメダスの教義を受け入れることになった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Four dozen fighters clashed in a bitter struggle. The forces were an equal match, and thus the duel righteous. By the end, only the indomitable Hectarchius, the priest of the Order of the Hammer was left standing, and, honouring their vow, the Malpians bowed down to him and accepted the teachings of Saint Nicomedas .{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}40数人のファイターが激闘を繰り広げた。戦力は拮抗していたため、正義の決闘となった。最終的に、鉄槌の修道会の司祭である不屈のヘクタールキウスが残り、マルピ人はその誓いに敬意を表して彼にひれ伏し、聖ニコメダスの教義を受け入れることになった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Quatre douzaines de combattants se livrent une lutte acharnée. Les belligérants étant à forces égales, le duel est considéré comme vertueux. Au terme du combat, il ne reste encore debout que l'indomptable Hectarchius, prêtre de l'Ordre du Marteau ; les Malpiens, honorant leur serment, se prosternent à ses pieds et acceptent les enseignements de Saint Nicomédas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Four dozen fighters clashed in a bitter struggle. The forces were an equal match, and thus the duel righteous. By the end, only the indomitable Hectarchius, the priest of the Order of the Hammer was left standing, and, honouring their vow, the Malpians bowed down to him and accepted the teachings of Saint Nicomedas .{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Quatre douzaines de combattants se livrent une lutte acharnée. Les belligérants étant à forces égales, le duel est considéré comme vertueux. Au terme du combat, il ne reste encore debout que l'indomptable Hectarchius, prêtre de l'Ordre du Marteau ; les Malpiens, honorant leur serment, se prosternent à ses pieds et acceptent les enseignements de Saint Nicomédas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vier Dutzend Kämpfer trafen in einer erbitterten Schlacht aufeinander. Die beiden Seiten waren ebenbürtig, es war ein rechtschaffenes Duell. Am Ende stand nur noch der unbezwingbare Hectarchius, der Priester des Ordens des Hammers. Die Malpianer hielten sich an ihren Schwur, verneigten sich vor ihm und akzeptieren die Lehren des Heiligen Nicomedas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Four dozen fighters clashed in a bitter struggle. The forces were an equal match, and thus the duel righteous. By the end, only the indomitable Hectarchius, the priest of the Order of the Hammer was left standing, and, honouring their vow, the Malpians bowed down to him and accepted the teachings of Saint Nicomedas .{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vier Dutzend Kämpfer trafen in einer erbitterten Schlacht aufeinander. Die beiden Seiten waren ebenbürtig, es war ein rechtschaffenes Duell. Am Ende stand nur noch der unbezwingbare Hectarchius, der Priester des Ordens des Hammers. Die Malpianer hielten sich an ihren Schwur, verneigten sich vor ihm und akzeptieren die Lehren des Heiligen Nicomedas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kırk kadar dövüşçü, amansız bir mücadelede çarpıştı. Kuvvetler eşit güçteydi ve böylece düello meşru kılındı. Mücadele sonunda Çekiç Tarikatı'nın boyun eğmez rahibi Hectarchius, ayakta kalan tek kişiydi ve antlarını yerine getiren Malpililer, onun önünde diz çökerek Aziz Nicomedes'in öğretilerini kabul ettiler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Four dozen fighters clashed in a bitter struggle. The forces were an equal match, and thus the duel righteous. By the end, only the indomitable Hectarchius, the priest of the Order of the Hammer was left standing, and, honouring their vow, the Malpians bowed down to him and accepted the teachings of Saint Nicomedes.{/n}
